column4: alright ubuntu developer peoples, I said I was really proud of you for magicking my volume control hotkeys to not be delayed anymore
because a few reboots later, they don't work anymore
was it an update? is it an intermittent bug? who knows!?
I'm disappointed in you, developer dudes
haha, silly user. You forgot to enable the flux capacitor's /0 macro.
man I unno I'm just frustrated
boot to an older kernel, eh?
do you get input from the keys using xev?
run xev in a terminal. put your mouse in the box, then do the media keys. Look in the terminal for output (events)
thanks for your help though, I'm gonna track it down in the morning when I can think straight :)
that's no good. I think it's your kernel if you aren't getting any output
